name: Call of Outlaws: Redemption
description:
The gangster clan is working for a mafia war that seems unstoppable. Hunt the crime family clan and knock down the mafia boss. Fight to survive the underworld battle for pure redemption. The plot takes place in the final decade of Wild West American Frontier in 1912. The culture of old Wild West has started to fade out & modern industry is on rising introducing fuel based transportation such as quad bikes & trains. Nathan 'Bloodlust' Boyd an ex-outlaw gangster was trying to move on with his life when he was taken away by the federal government people to take down the escaped gangster members of his former gang. Now Nathan has to track down the Bernard ‘One Eye’, leader of the ‘The Black Blood Brotherhood’ who is a dangerous outlaw gangster man in the region for redemption. “The Black Blood Brotherhood" gang members have attacked many modern warehouses to steal the fuel quad bikes & are using them to capture the other territories in the region. The coal mines in the mountains & railway access are also in power of the clan, which has stopped the progress in the modern industry. Now Nathan has to work together with the old Wild West federal government to take down the outlaws for redemption & start a new era of modern America. Vegas crime street outlaws started with a simple street brawl and rival gangs. The fighting mafia reached Chicago city making it a battlefield for extremely adventurous mafia hero. Aiming for a worldwide turf war, this underworld mafia life needs to be stopped. The police story is all about pairing up with the federal government people to find the mafia boss and the gangs in Call of Mafia Outlaws Redemption: Gangster Games.
Call of Mafia Outlaws Redemption features:
√ Stealth mode
√ Amazing gameplay
√ Fast-paced gameplay
√ Intuitive 1st person and 3rd person controls
√ Play as a fighter in the most challenging mission games
√ Ultimate action-packed immersive fighter assault missions
√ Most thrilling and dangerous third-person​ shooting secret agent rescue mission games
